name: Auto-Corrected
description:
You play as an out of touch mayor who's trying to figure out social media and keeps tweeting bad auto-corrected messages, angering his citizens.

Fight your way into angry hordes to turn them back into happy citizens and correct your PR mistakes.

This game was made in May 2022 as part of a self-imposed challenge to make a game in 48 non consecutive hours with the theme: CORRECTION.

Special thanks to bembrooks for thinking of the theme.

Using music made by Steven Melin

I'll be making a devlog about this game in the near futur, subscribe to my youtube channel to not miss it <3
